Package lexa.core.data

Provides the classes for managing a polymorphic set of data.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataArray
    An array of values The array is self sizing, as it is implemented as a linked list.
    DataFactory
    Factory to create consistent instances for DataSets and their components.
    DataFactoryItem
    Interface for any item that uses a DataFactory;
    DataItem
    Interface for a single DataItem
    DataSet  
    DataValue
    Interface for a value within a DataSet
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayDataArray
    An array of values The array is self sizing, as it is implemented as a linked list.
    ArrayDataItem
    A single item in a data set.
    ArrayDataSet
    Provide a polymorphic map containing disparate data types as values.
    ArrayDataValue
    Implementation of DataValue for use in a ArrayDataSet
    ArrayFactory  
    BaseDataArray
    Base implementation of a DataArray
    BaseDataItem
    Provide the type safe getters for a data item.
    BaseDataSet
    Provide the base methods for a data set.
    BaseDataValue
    Provide the type safe getters for a value.
    BaseFactory  
    DataArrayIterator
    Iterate over a DataArray returning each DataValue in order.
    DataSetIterator
    Iterate over a DataSet.
    HashDataArray
    An array of values for a HashDataSet
    HashDataItem
    A single item in a data set.
    HashDataSet
    A data set using hashed keys to access the content A DataSet that utilises a HashMap for storing the items.
    HashDataValue
    Implementation of DataValue for use in a HashDataSet
    HashFactory  
    SealedDataSet
    A read only ArrayDataSet.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DataType
    An enumeration that defines the set of supported value types for a DataItem The acceptable type are: NULL ARRAY BOOLEAN DATA_SET DATE DOUBLE INTEGER LONG STRING OBJECT

Package lexa.core.data Description

Provides the classes for managing a polymorphic set of data.

Each DataSet is a list of key/value pairs stored as a DataItem. The key is always a String and the value can be any type of object. There is inbuilt support for the basic data types of Boolean, DataSet, Date, Double, Integer and String.

Support is provided to serialise and deserialise the data using the inbuilt Format classes.

Data can be sent to streams using the DataReader and DataWriter.

Since:
2009-07
Author:
William N-W
